channel.title: Help me remember this movie.
channel.description:
Alright people. I need help remembering an asian movie. I don't know which country, chinese or japanese maybe but definitely not indian.
I can only remember the ending of the movie and only minor details but I hope it helps. It's a comedy? [b]cooking movie[/b] with a small [b]cooking competition[/b] at the end. They present food like [b]hotcold bear paw[/b] and still alive [b]monkey brain[/b]. Turns out the monkey brain is made out of soya and the monkey sounds were coming from a toy? under the table.
The movie is not Tampopo or Man eat drink woman.
I don't know if you guys watch a lot of asian movies so I put up all my hope into Fong.

item.title: Help me remember this movie.
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
I am looking for a movie for a long time - and google always finds me everything else but that.

a jungle fighter of some sort comes to a house and is supposed to kill the proprietor. The wife sees him entering the house and tries to distract him with her - eehm - body. The Fighter then stabs her with a bush knife.

Anybody know that movie?

Read full topic
